xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils

Interface MHistogram

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MHistograms.AbstractSelHistogram, MHistograms.MinSkewHistogram, MHistograms.MinSkewProgressiveRefinementHistogram, MHistograms.RHistogram, MHistograms.RKHistHistogram, MHistograms.RTreeBasicHistogram, MHistograms.STHistForest

    public interface MHistogram
    This is a simple interface for spatial histograms. Histogram buckets are represented using WeightedDoublePointRectangle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      builds histogram

      computes spatial selectivity
